programme.title: Forensic Factor - Forensics on Trial (Season 2, Episode 1)
programme.desc: A six-year old girl, Andrea Atkinson, is found dead in the boiler room of her Toronto tenement. Forensic investigators quickly determine she has been raped and smothered.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Fremont Bomber (Season 3, Episode 1)
programme.desc: Explosive experts sifting through bomb evidence discover a more insidious plan.

programme.title: The First 48 - Unwelcome Guest / Wrecked (Season 7, Episode 12)
programme.desc: In Memphis, Sgt. Connie Justice investigates the homicide of a man found bludgeoned to death in his apartment. With no witnesses to the crime, Justice must rely on the physical evidence from the victim's apartment to track down her suspect.

programme.title: The First 48 - Chain of Death (Season 21, Episode 1)
programme.desc: A young mother and her best friend gunned down in broad daylight sets off a chain of events that Tulsa Homicide never could have imagined.

programme.title: The First 48 - Point of No Return (#424) (Season 21, Episode 27)
programme.desc: In Mobile, when two friends are found executed in a car on a dark dead-end street, the investigation leads detectives to an unlikely suspect.

programme.title: The First 48 - Mr. New Orleans/ No Shelter (Season 18, Episode 4)
programme.desc: New Orleans Homicide works the stabbing death of an infamous local criminal. In Minneapolis, a squabble amongst friends leaves a woman brutally murdered in a bus station.

programme.title: The First 48 - Skipping School/ Gamer (#427) (Season 21, Episode 30)
programme.desc: In Atlanta, a 23-year-old man is shot dead in front of his friends after a bad deal. In Tulsa, a 15-year-old high school student is found on the stairs of an apartment filled with kids.
